summary: The MkDocs AI Hooks project enhances technical documentation and blogs with AI-driven summary generation and intelligent reading statistics using MkDocs hooks. Key features include AI-generated summaries, multi-language support, multiple AI service compatibility, intelligent content cleaning, efficient caching, and flexible configuration. It also offers intelligent reading statistics with precise Chinese character counting, code detection, estimated reading time, and visually appealing information display. The system supports automatic language recognition, content type detection, cache optimization, error handling, and advanced API integration for various AI services.
